actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of (present and former) employees of the (Defense Supply Agency) at the Defense Construction Supply Center in Columbus, Ohio.

summary.text: Directs that service performed by 51 named individuals, during a specified period of time, under the Federal cataloging program of the Department of Defense shall be considered creditable service for purposes of civil service retirement.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of (present and former) employees of the (Defense Supply Agency) at the Defense Construction Supply Center in Columbus, Ohio.
